name: test_e2e_with_logs[043_XSS_DOM_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_003` |
| **Name** | eval() code injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_based_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `eval('alert(document.domain)')`
- **Encoded**: `eval('alert(document.domain)')`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
